frontmatter.title: IBM Cloud, Data & AI - design review committee
frontmatter.description: A description of my responsibilities on the IBM CD&AI design review committee.

internal.content:
---
title: IBM Cloud, Data & AI - design review committee
description: A description of my responsibilities on the IBM CD&AI design review committee. 
---

<PageDescription>
    IBM comprises a huge range of products with experiences for many different user roles.
    One of the ways that we ensure high quality and consistent interfaces is with Designed User Experience reviews.
    I really enjoy being a member of the reviewing panel, and feel that it's a great way to learn about different user problems. 
    I get to meet lots and lots of design and product teams, all over the world, too!
</PageDescription>
